[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@anglr/datetime](./datetime.md) &gt; [DateApiObject](./datetime.dateapiobject.md)

## DateApiObject interface

Instance of object wrapping TDate, allowing manipulation with it

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface DateApiObject<TDate = any> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [originalValue](./datetime.dateapiobject.originalvalue.md) | TDate | Original value that is not changed unless 'updateOriginal' is called |
|  [value](./datetime.dateapiobject.value.md) | TDate | Instance of date |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [addDays(count)](./datetime.dateapiobject.adddays.md) | Add days, if count not specified adds 1 day |
|  [addMonths(count)](./datetime.dateapiobject.addmonths.md) | Add months, if count not specified adds 1 month |
|  [addWeeks(count)](./datetime.dateapiobject.addweeks.md) | Add weeks, if count not specified adds 1 week |
|  [addYears(count)](./datetime.dateapiobject.addyears.md) | Add years, if count not specified adds 1 year |
|  [clone()](./datetime.dateapiobject.clone.md) | Creates clone of this instance, value and originalValue have same value and are cloned from value |
|  [cloneOriginal()](./datetime.dateapiobject.cloneoriginal.md) | Creates clone of this instance, value and originalValue have same value and are cloned from originalValue |
|  [dayOfMonth()](./datetime.dateapiobject.dayofmonth.md) | Gets day of month one based |
|  [dayOfMonth(day)](./datetime.dateapiobject.dayofmonth_1.md) | Sets day of month one based |
|  [dayOfMonth(day)](./datetime.dateapiobject.dayofmonth_2.md) | Gets or sets day of month one based |
|  [dayOfWeek()](./datetime.dateapiobject.dayofweek.md) | Gets day of week zero based, first is monday |
|  [dayOfWeek(day)](./datetime.dateapiobject.dayofweek_1.md) | Sets day of week zero based, first is monday |
|  [dayOfWeek(day)](./datetime.dateapiobject.dayofweek_2.md) | Gets or sets day of week zero based, first is monday |
|  [daysInMonth()](./datetime.dateapiobject.daysinmonth.md) | Gets number of days in month |
|  [diffDays(date)](./datetime.dateapiobject.diffdays.md) | Gets number of days between this and provided date |
|  [endOfDay()](./datetime.dateapiobject.endofday.md) | Updates value to end date and time of current day |
|  [endOfDecade()](./datetime.dateapiobject.endofdecade.md) | Updates value to end date and time of current decade |
|  [endOfMonth()](./datetime.dateapiobject.endofmonth.md) | Updates value to end date and time of current month |
|  [endOfWeek()](./datetime.dateapiobject.endofweek.md) | Updates value to end date and time of current week |
|  [endOfYear()](./datetime.dateapiobject.endofyear.md) | Updates value to end date and time of current year |
|  [format(format)](./datetime.dateapiobject.format.md) | Formats date value |
|  [isAfter(date)](./datetime.dateapiobject.isafter.md) | Gets indication whether current value is after 'date' |
|  [isBefore(date)](./datetime.dateapiobject.isbefore.md) | Gets indication whether current value is before 'date' |
|  [isSameDay(date)](./datetime.dateapiobject.issameday.md) | Compares whether this date is same day as provided date |
|  [isSameDecade(date)](./datetime.dateapiobject.issamedecade.md) | Compares whether this date is same decade as provided date |
|  [isSameMonth(date)](./datetime.dateapiobject.issamemonth.md) | Compares whether this date is same month as provided date |
|  [isSameWeek(date)](./datetime.dateapiobject.issameweek.md) | Compares whether this date is same week as provided date |
|  [isSameYear(date)](./datetime.dateapiobject.issameyear.md) | Compares whether this date is same year as provided date |
|  [isValid()](./datetime.dateapiobject.isvalid.md) | Gets indication whether provided instance of date is valid |
|  [isWeekend()](./datetime.dateapiobject.isweekend.md) | Gets indication whether provided instance of date is weekend day |
|  [month()](./datetime.dateapiobject.month.md) | Gets month |
|  [month(month)](./datetime.dateapiobject.month_1.md) | Sets month |
|  [month(month)](./datetime.dateapiobject.month_2.md) | Gets or sets month |
|  [resetOriginal()](./datetime.dateapiobject.resetoriginal.md) | Changes value to same value as originalValue |
|  [startOfDay()](./datetime.dateapiobject.startofday.md) | Updates value to start date and time of current day |
|  [startOfDecade()](./datetime.dateapiobject.startofdecade.md) | Updates value to start date and time of current decade |
|  [startOfMonth()](./datetime.dateapiobject.startofmonth.md) | Updates value to start date and time of current month |
|  [startOfWeek()](./datetime.dateapiobject.startofweek.md) | Updates value to start date and time of current week |
|  [startOfYear()](./datetime.dateapiobject.startofyear.md) | Updates value to start date and time of current year |
|  [subtractDays(count)](./datetime.dateapiobject.subtractdays.md) | Subtract days, if count not specified subtract 1 day |
|  [subtractMonths(count)](./datetime.dateapiobject.subtractmonths.md) | Subtract months, if count not specified subtract 1 month |
|  [subtractWeeks(count)](./datetime.dateapiobject.subtractweeks.md) | Subtract weeks, if count not specified subtract 1 week |
|  [subtractYears(count)](./datetime.dateapiobject.subtractyears.md) | Subtract years, if count not specified subtract 1 year |
|  [updateOriginal(value)](./datetime.dateapiobject.updateoriginal.md) | Updates originalValue, if value is not provided originalValue is set to value |
